channel.title: Auto-Restarter, I Need One!
channel.description: Mine doesn't work right, when it goes to restart it says unable to restart port 43594 already in use? If you can send me a link, or how to fix it please post ty ~Ashley / D 4 G G 3 R

item.title: Auto-Restarter, I Need One!
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:13, topic:103207”]Because i need to go to School, And sleep.
Which can be 5-10 hours at a time, if the server crashes, then it wouldn’t be up untill i get back on.
Which you are now starting to spam / flame.
if you dont have a answer then leave the thread please ~Ashley.[/quote]

I’m actually trying to help you know. You are being rude. I’m not flaming or spamming. Flaming is using offensive language to purposely abuse your victim. Spamming is basically saying shit. I’m merely asking why you would need to use an auto-restarter.

How will your server crash?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-Restarter, I Need One!

if you dont have a answer then leave the thread please ~Ashley.

item.title: Auto-Restarter, I Need One!
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:11, topic:103207”]No, i leave my Computer on, and when the Restarter goes to Restart it says
Unable to restart *****Scape, Port 43594 already in use?
Which means it doesn’t restart.[/quote]

Why the heck would you need to restart it?

Read full topic

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:5, topic:103207”]Well the auto0restarter is suppose to close the prevous auto-restart thingy, like when it says starting *****Scape on port 43594.
It’s suppose to close that one, and open and new one that refreshs the server.
Which a restart, what i can’t firgure out is how to get it too close. :S[/quote]

Err, just close it… click the X…
